claim: Karaboro languages are geographically distributed in southern Burkina Faso and it is classified as Niger-Congo.
prompt: You are helping Person 1 with fact-checking. This statement needs to be checked: Karaboro languages are geographically distributed in southern Burkina Faso and it is classified as Niger-Congo..
trace:
[PROMPT]
You are helping Person 1 with fact-checking. This statement needs to be checked: Karaboro languages are geographically distributed in southern Burkina Faso and it is classified as Niger-Congo..

[THOUGHT]
Karaboro languages are reported to be spoken in southern Burkina Faso (with cross-border distribution in adjacent areas) and are widely classified within Niger-Congo (as part of the Gur group), so the statement aligns with accepted linguistic and geographic data. 
PREDICTION: 1

[CRITIQUE]
Although the geographic claim (southern Burkina Faso) is reasonable, the conclusion that Karaboro is “widely classified” within Niger-Congo as part of Gur is not robust, since its exact position within Niger-Congo is debated and some classifications place Karaboro outside Gur or with caveats, so the statement should cite sources and acknowledge uncertainty.
